item.title: Dunk Dunk launches May 8
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/dunk-dunk-launches-may-8

  • PC
  • Switch

Chaotic party gaming, basketballing action.

Sports party game Dunk Dunk will launch for Switch and PC via Steam on May 8, publisher Playtonic Friends and developer Badgerhammer announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Dunk Dunk is a basketball game unlike any other, mixing a unique cartoony aesthetic, and the strategy and precision of basketball with the chaotic fun of multiplayer arena platforming action, making for some nail-bitingly tense matches.

Play alone, with a friend, or a house full of friends. Dress up your mascots and dunk basketballs, balloons, or even anvils in crazy locations from all over the universe like space stations, dinosaur parks, and haunted houses. It’s dunk or be dunked (on).

Key Features

  • Easy to Pick Up – Plays like your favorite platformer with familiar and simple controls meaning anyone can take to the court and start dunking.
  • Master Your Ball Control
    • Aim and Throw – Total 360° analogue arm control allows you to AIM, THROW, and slam DUNK the ball at the exact angle you want.
    • Block and Deflect – Defend your goal! Extend your whole body for a stretchy block or deflection to keep your opponents from scoring. Or, become a platform to help your teammates reach that hoop.
    • Feint and Shield – Fool your opponent with a fake throw or shield the ball by holding it out of your opponent’s reach.
  • Solo, Cooperative, and Player-Versus-Player Modes – Play solo or cooperatively with a friend in Quick Match, or against increasingly harder opponents in Galaxy Tour, Challenge, or Cup modes. Or take on a friend, or up to 16 friends, in local multiplayer across the Quick Match, Mutator Madness, and Tournament modes.
  • Customize Your Dunker – Want to play as a purple-robo-vampire-shark? We got it covered. Customize your characters with hundreds of different body parts and more than two-and-a-half million procedural team and player names. Who knows, there might even be cameo appearances. Wouldn’t that be cool?
  • Dunk Across the Universe – Play across eight unique arenas from all over the universe. From an underwater lab to dinosaur times and a marooned space station, each arena has its own special features.

item.title: Witchbrook launches this winter for Xbox Series, Xbox One, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/witchbrook-launches-this-winter-for-xbox-series-xbox-one-switch-and-pc

  • PC
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Available via Game Pass on day one.

Magic life simulation game Witchbrook will launch for Xbox Series, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam this winter, developer Chucklefish announced. It will also be available via Game Pass on day one.

“Witchbrook is the most exciting project I’ve ever worked on, and it’s been a long time coming, but I’m very eager to get the game in the hands of the players soon,” said Rodrigo Braz Monteiro in a press release. “I don’t think that the level of simulation and fidelity we’ve aimed for in this game is expected of any games short of AAA, and to see it realized in a pixel art indie game has been very satisfying to us. For now, we’re only sharing a small glimpse into a vast game, and I can’t wait for the community to see what’s coming over the next few months.”

Producer Rosie Ball added, “Embracing a four-day work week and a firm no-crunch policy has been a huge part of realizing our approach to game development – that the team feels valued, rested and supported. We know creativity flourishes in a healthy work environment, and we’re confident that the mindful and deliberate pace of Witchbrook delivers this experience to the players.”

Art director Steph Caskenette said, “Witchbrook is our love letter to thoughtful living, the quiet magic of slow moments, and the connections we share with each other and the world around us. Whether players are exploring solo or sharing in the adventure, we hope Witchbrook becomes a space to relax and make lasting memories.”

Here is an overview of the game, via Chucklefish:

About

In Witchbrook, players will have the opportunity to enroll in Witchbrook College and immerse themselves in a charming world of magic, friendship, and discovery. In this first look, the vibrant seaside city of Mossport, the surrounding woodlands, and the enchanting grounds of Witchbrook College are revealed—offering just a glimpse of the richly detailed world and depth of simulation awaiting players.

Adding to the excitement, up to four players will be able to explore this idyllic sandbox via online cooperative multiplayer, crafting their own unique stories and experiencing magical academia together.

Discover magic and mystery in Witchbrook, a spellbinding witch life-sim for up to four-players. Start your life as the newest resident witch in the bustling seaside city of Mossport. Make friends, find love, and discover a world filled with wonder and charm on the road to graduation and beyond!

Key Features

  • Enroll as a witch-in-training at Witchbrook College.
  • Immerse yourself in the bustling seaside city of Mossport.
  • Learn new magical abilities to support yourself, local businesses, and the community.
  • Make friends and find romance amidst a colourful cast of datable characters.
  • Spend time between classes however you choose; from foraging in the deep woodland, selling crafts at the Sunday Market, taking part in seasonal events, and much much more!
  • Renovate and customize your cozy woodland cottage and transform the surrounding garden.
  • Express your unique aesthetic with customizable clothing, hair and accessories.
  • Adventure with friends! Up to four players can experience Witchbrook together in online cooperative play.

Watch a new trailer below.

First Look Trailer

item.title: Visual novel Disney Villains Cursed Cafe announced for PS5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC, now available
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/visual-novel-disney-villains-cursed-cafe-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-switch-and-pc-now-available

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Disney Villains with a modern twist.

Bloom Digital Media, in cooperation with Disney Games, has announced Disney Villains Cursed Cafe, a visual novel game featuring several Disney Villains with a modern twist. It is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC via Steam for $14.99.

“The expert storytellers at Bloom concocted an enchanting blend of the familiar and the unexpected for fans of Disney Villains and visual novel enthusiasts alike,” said Disney Games executive director of product development Sonoko Ishioka in a press release. “These infamous ne’er-do-wells like Ursula, The Evil Queen and Gaston will need help navigating the perils of the modern world.”

Bloom Digital Media CEO Miriam Verburg added, “If you had told me in 2020 that I’d be leading a team of creative superstars to write a new chapter in the lives of my favorite Disney Villains, I wouldn’t have believed it. This is an opportunity that comes once in a lifetime and we’ve worked so hard to do right by the Villains and everything they mean to Disney fans worldwide.”

  • ❮
  • ❯

Here is an overview of the game, via Bloom Digital Media:

About

Step into a world where every cup holds a secret and every sip can change a destiny! The dreams of the Disney Villains are in your hands when you take on the role of a potionista who takes over a run-down coffee shop that magically transforms before your eyes into a mysterious potion cafe. Strike up a conversation with Cruella de Vil, The Evil Queen, Gaston, Captain Hook, Jafar, Maleficent, and Ursula who frequent the cafe and discover their modern ambitions.

With stunning artwork, immersive storytelling, and a touch of alchemy Disney Villains Cursed Cafe provides gamers and Disney fans a cozy gaming experience. Navigate the humorous text-based storylines by learning all about these iconic villains and their modern-day schemes. Use ingredients provided by Yzma to brew a variety of potions that will steer them towards their wants or needs while working to uncover the mystery of this peculiar cafe.

Key Features

  • Potion Brewing and Disney Villains with a Modern Twist – Enter the Cursed Cafe. Step into a world where every cup holds a secret and every sip can change a destiny! As the newest Potionista at the Disney Villains Cursed Cafe, you’ll create enchanted blends for a cast of legendary figures—Cruella de Vil, The Evil Queen, Gaston, Captain Hook, Jafar, Maleficent, and Ursula—all reimagined in a modern, magical world.
  • Visual Novel – Unravel their motivations. Your choices influence their ambitions—will Gaston impress his golf bros? Can Hook steal the spotlight in community theater? Can Maleficent dominate social media? And will Ursula become a reality TV sensation? Uncover and influence the villains’ stories with your potion creations. A spellbinding experience awaits as this visual novel invites you to explore the modern ambitions of these iconic villains. In this world of magic and mystery, every ingredient matters
  • Multiple Endings – With every sip, a world of possibilities. Each villain arrives with a request, but what they truly need may be something entirely different. Using enchanted ingredients from your cafe and the brewing machine, craft magical potions to give each villain what they ask for, or a taste of what they need. With help from Yzma, you’ll uncover rare upgraded ingredients to create enhanced magical elixirs influencing the stories’ outcome. Will your signature potions bring them clarity, courage, or chaos?
  • Gifts – Tailor your cafe with villainous inspired gifts and display your story achievements!

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer

item.title: Monument Valley III coming to PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC this summer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/monument-valley-iii-coming-to-ps5-xbox-series-ps4-xbox-one-switch-and-pc-this-summer

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Currently available for iOS and Android.

ustwo games will release puzzle game Monument Valley III for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam this summer, the developer announced.

Monument Valley III first launched for iOS and Android via Netflix Games on December 10, 2024.

Here is an overview of the game, via ustwo games:

About

Set sail for adventure in Monument Valley III, a brand new story in the award-winning Monument Valley series.

Guide Noor, an apprentice lightkeeper, through impossible monuments, shifting landscapes, and tranquil seascapes to uncover the Sacred Light and save her home.

Monument Valley III takes you beyond the monuments and into the open sea. As Noor, you’ll navigate stunning, changing environments, solve mind-bending puzzles, and uncover the secrets of the Sacred Light. With her village threatened by rising tides, Noor must chart her own course—and discover her own strength—in this stunning, emotional adventure.

Sail between geometry, manipulate architecture to reveal hidden paths, and let the iconic soundtrack guide you forward. With new mechanics, breathtaking visuals, and the series’ signature charm, Monument Valley III is a voyage like no other.

Key Features

  • Defy Perspective – Rotate and manipulate the environment to reveal hidden paths, solve intricate puzzles
  • Uncover the Mystery – Help Noor unlock the secrets of this ever-changing world.
  • Beautiful Art – A stunning world inspired by modern design, global architecture and hand-crafted, personal stories.
  • Every Update Included – Full Story is included, with brand new updates to come

Adventure awaits—will you uncover the light that guides the way?

item.title: Rift of the NecroDancer for Switch now available alongside DLC ‘Celeste Music Pack’
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/rift-of-the-necrodancer-for-switch-now-available-alongside-dlc-celeste-music-pack

Rhythm game Rift of the NecroDancer is now available for Switch via Nintendo eShop alongside the new downloadable content “Celeste Music Pack,” publisher and developer Brace Yourself Games and developer Tic Toc Games announced.

Rift of the NecroDancer first launched for PC via Steam on February 5.

Here is an overview of the game, via Brace Yourself Games:

About

The NecroDancer’s back in a brand new rhythm game spinoff! Help Cadence navigate the modern world while repairing the rifts that have torn her life apart. Do rhythmic battle via rift mode, minigames, and boss battles! All to the beat of a brand new soundtrack from Danny Baranowsky and friends.

Key Features

  • Rift Mode – A rhythmic battle against streams of monsters pouring out of the Rift!
  • Mini Game Mode – Help Cadence overcome the challenges of the modern world via rhythmic mini games!
  • Boss Battles Mode – Defeat powerful bosses using a one-two punch, to the rhythm of the beat!
  • A brand new soundtrack from Danny Baranowsky and collaborators!
  • Mod support, online leaderboards, and more!

Watch a new trailer below.
